statements: SELECT * FROM property_distribution;
SELECT property_type, property_count FROM property_distribution;
SELECT * FROM property_distribution ORDER BY property_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM property_distribution WHERE property_count > 10;
SELECT property_type, SUM(property_count) AS total_count FROM property_distribution GROUP BY property_type ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT id, property_type, property_count FROM property_distribution WHERE property_type = 'House';
SELECT * FROM property_distribution WHERE property_count > 10 ORDER BY property_type ASC;
SELECT property_type, SUM(property_count) AS total_count FROM property_distribution GROUP BY property_type;
SELECT id, property_count, property_type FROM property_distribution WHERE property_count BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT MAX(property_count) AS max_count, MIN(property_count) AS min_count FROM property_distribution;
SELECT * FROM properties;
SELECT property_name, property_type FROM properties;
SELECT property_id, property_name FROM properties WHERE property_type = 'Apartment';
SELECT * FROM properties ORDER BY property_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_properties FROM properties;
SELECT * FROM properties ORDER BY property_id DESC;
SELECT property_name, property_type FROM properties WHERE property_type='Apartment';
SELECT property_id, property_name FROM properties WHERE property_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT property_id, property_name, property_type FROM properties INNER JOIN reports ON properties.property_id = reports.property_id;
SELECT AVG(total_properties) AS average_properties FROM reports;
SELECT * FROM properties;
SELECT property_id, property_type, address FROM properties WHERE city='New York';
SELECT * FROM property_types ORDER BY type_name DESC;
SELECT property_id, city, state FROM properties WHERE state='California';
SELECT property_id, address, city, zip_code FROM properties WHERE zip_code='90210';
SELECT * FROM properties WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY address DESC, zip_code ASC;
SELECT property_id, property_type, city FROM properties WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT property_id, address, city, state FROM properties ORDER BY state ASC, city DESC;
SELECT property_id, state, zip_code, owner_id FROM properties WHERE owner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

SELECT pd.distribution_id, pt.type_name, p.address FROM property_distribution pd JOIN property_types pt ON pd.property_type_id = pt.property_type_id JOIN properties p ON pd.property_id = p.property_id WHERE pd.distribution_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM property_types;
To select all columns from the property_types table.
SELECT property_name, property_type FROM property_types WHERE property_id = 1;
To select specific columns from the property_types table with a condition.
SELECT * FROM portfolio ORDER BY portfolio_name DESC;
To select all columns from the portfolio table and order the results by portfolio_name in descending order.
SELECT portfolio_id, portfolio_name FROM portfolio WHERE portfolio_id IN (1, 2, 3);
To select specific columns from the portfolio table with a condition using the IN operator.
SELECT DISTINCT property_type FROM property_types;
To select unique values from the property_type column in the property_types table.
SELECT property_name, property_type FROM property_types
SELECT * FROM property_types WHERE property_id = 1
SELECT portfolio_name, COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM portfolio JOIN reports ON portfolio.portfolio_id = reports.portfolio_id GROUP BY portfolio.portfolio_id

SELECT property_name, portfolio_name FROM property_types JOIN property_mapping ON property_types.property_id = property_mapping.property_id JOIN portfolio ON property_mapping.portfolio_id = portfolio.portfolio_id
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM properties;
SELECT property_id, property_type FROM properties;
SELECT * FROM portfolios ORDER BY portfolio_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT property_id FROM property_portfolio_mapping;
SELECT property_type_name FROM property_types WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM properties WHERE property_type = 'Apartment' AND property_id > 100;
SELECT property_id, property_type FROM properties WHERE property_type = 'House' ORDER BY property_id DESC;
SELECT portfolio_id, portfolio_name FROM portfolios WHERE portfolio_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND portfolio_name LIKE '%Tech%';
SELECT property_type_name FROM property_types WHERE property_type_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY property_type_name ASC;

SELECT p.property_id, p.property_type, pf.portfolio_name FROM properties p JOIN property_portfolio_mapping ppm ON p.property_id = ppm.property_id JOIN portfolios pf ON ppm.portfolio_id = pf.portfolio_id WHERE p.property_type = 'Office' ORDER BY p.property_id ASC, pf.portfolio_name DESC;
